Question: This person hosted his final broadcast on terrestrial airwaves on December 16, 2005.
Hints: In 2002, this person acquired the rights to comedy films Rock 'n' Roll High School (1979) and Porky's (1982).
A settlement was reached on May 25, with Sirius paying $2 million to CBS for control of this person's 20-year broadcast archives.
This person released 50 Ways to Rank Your Mother, a comedy album of his radio bits.
